EADialog.text:
Добро пожаловать в SimAirport! Это предварительная версия, находящаяся в раннем доступе. Тем не менее, мы надеемся, что игра Вам понравится. Мы призываем вас стать активным пользователей наших форумов и частью сообщества, и действительно активно участвовать в процессе разработки наряду с нашей командой.
Спасибо за Вашу поддержку и за то, что помогаете делать игру лучшим симулятором управления аэропортом из когда-либо созданных!

mainmenu.copyright: Copyright 2018, LVGameDev LLC. Все права защищены. SimAirport является торговой маркой LVGameDev LLC.

tt.desc1: Используйте все свои умения, чтобы построить прибыльный аэропорт!
tt.desc2: Вы не сможете тратить деньги при отрицательном балансе
tt.desc3: Отрицательный баланс в течение 48 часов приведет к банкротству
tt.desc4: В начале игры доступна только карта среднего размера
tt.desc7: Можно распоряжаться деньгами даже при отрицательном балансе
tt.desc8: Игра не завершится при наступлении условий банкротства

tt0.desc0: В режиме карьеры Вам досутпно начало игры на карте размера "{0}" ({1}x{2}). Вы можете увеличивать размеры территории для развития аэропорта, покупая соседние участки земли.

tt1.desc0: Начиная игру в режиме песочницы, Вам предоставляется возможность выбрать размеры начального участка. Эта опция определяет только размеры участка в начале игры, не лишая Вас возможности увеличения территории. Имейте в виду, что с увеличением площади участка возрастает и размер налога на него!

tt.desc: Начало игры на пустом участке предоставляет Вам больше возможностей для строительства, но в этом случае потребуется больше времени от начала игры до приема первого рейса. Если Вы начинающий игрок, рекомендуем оставить эту опцию отключенной, чтобы ознакомиться с основами игры на примере предварительно построенного небольшого аэропорта.

save.title: Сохранение
save.edgeBranchNotice: В качестве меры предосторожности, перезапись файлов запрещена в редакции Edge. Пожалуйста, используйте уникальное имя для каждого сохранения.
save.search: Показано {0} из {1} сохранений, содержащих "{2}". Чтобы показать все существующие сохранения, очистите поле ввода имени файла выше.

delete.title: Удалить файл
delete.desc:
ВНИМАНИЕ!
Сохранение будет навсегда удалено с Вашего компьютера. Вы УВЕРЕНЫ, что хотите удалить это сохранение?

gameplay.title: Игра
gameplay.language2: Советуем перезапустить SimAirport после смены языка.

steam.title: Загрузка & Добавление в мастерскую Steam
steam.name: Название
steam.e_exception: Что-то пошло не так... Пожалуйста, сообщите об этом разработчикам!
steam.desc0: Пожалуйста, дождитесь пока игра будет сохранена, загружена в Steam и опубликована в Мастерской SimAirport!
steam.desc2: Дождитесь окончания загрузки & Вашей модицикации в Steam -- и её публикации в Мастерской SimAirport!
steam.desc3: Ваши файлы опубликованы в мастерской Steam.

tt.title: Условия использования
tt.desc0: Для того, чтобы поделиться своим аэропортом с сообществом, вы ДОЛЖНЫ подтвердить своё согласие с условиями обслуживания Мастерской Steam Workshop!

tt0.title: Действие запрещено
tt0.desc0: Вы можете загрузить или обновить только те модификации, авторами которых Вы являетесь..

tt1.desc0: Для использования этой модификации, требуется установка других (дополнительные самолеты). Эти зависимости должны быть загружены в Steam до загрузки основной модифиации.
tt1.desc1: Требуется добавить в эту модификацию собственные изображения перед её загрузкой в Мастерскую Steam.
tt1.desc2: В Мастерскую Steam можно загрузить только модифиации, содержащие новые изображения.

tt2.title: Пробное появление невозможно
tt2.desc0: Для этого необходимо установить мод "Mod Test Map" (загружается с помощью левой панели). Пробное появление возможно на подходящей & стоянке в аэропорту без пассажиров и других самолетов.

mods.tt3: Create a new Aircraft mod, which allows you to create an entirely new Type of aircraft. You can then include this Aircraft in any of your custom Airline fleets & share it on the Steam Workshop.
mods.tt4: Refresh the listing of available Aircraft mods found on your computer.
mods.tt5: Opens the mod folder location in your computer's file browser program.
mods.tt6: Create a new Airline mod using the default templates; you can then edit the settings and graphics using 3rd party programs.
mods.tt7: Refresh the above listing of available Airline mods found on your computer.

research.title: Исследования & Разработки
research.edgeNote: Только в редакции Edge: Правый клик для немедленного исследования.

tt.title: {0} {1} предложений
tt.desc2: Немедленно получить бонус за подписание и добавить рейсы в расписание.
tt.desc4: Ваш аэропорт не оборудован для приема самолетов данного типа.
tt.desc5: Для приема более 10 рейсов в день, Вам необходимо построить диспетчерскую вышку.
tt.desc6: Требуется как минимум одна ВПП с огнями.

tt.title: Редактирование столбцов
tt.desc1: Нажмите для скрытия или отображения столбцов. Используйяте инструмент размера (справа снижу) для изменения размера.

loans.title: Кредиты
loans.desc1: Вы можете занять деньги в банке, в этом случае, банк начнет ежедневно снимать со счета проценты.
loans.desc2: Важно: Автоматически со счета списываются только проценты за использование кредита. Непосредственно кредит необходимо выплачивать вручную, через меню раздел Кредиты.

pl.title: Доходы & Расходы
pl.tt: Нажмите чтобы показать или скрыть подробности...

pricing.title: Регулирование расценок
pricing.intro: Set the prices that airlines must pay you. Be careful -- some airlines are more cost-sensitive than other airlines; airlines may decide not to work with you if your prices are too expensive or your airport services can't justify the costs!
pricing.rwyusage: Плата за использование ВПП Сколько платят авиакомпании за одно использование взлетно-посадочной полосы.
pricing.terminalusage: Плата за использование Сколько платят авиакомпании за пользование терминалом (за одного пассажира).
pricing.btnsaveerror: Невозможно изменить! Необходимо выждать 12 часов после предыдущих изменений!
pricing.btnsavewarning: Повышение расценок негативно влияет на интерес авиакопаний к Вашему аэропорту. Это может привести даже к разрыву контракта!! Примечение: Расценки можно изменять не чаще, чем один раз в 12 часов!

Garbage.title: Мусор
Garbage.description: - Вывоз всего в пределах зоны сбора мусора

runways.title: ВПП
runways.restriction_common: Be careful -- flights will cancel if they do not have a runway available that can access their gate!

fuel.title: Снабжение топливом
fuel.recurringdesc: Литров в день по рыночной цене
fuel.desc1: Refueling services will not be offered to airlines.
fuel.desc3: If prices stay the same, about {0} of {1} flight(s) will request fuel.
fuel.desc4: This will require approximately {0} - {1} liters of fuel.
fuel.desc8: Refueling services will not be offered to airlines.
fuel.desc9: Fuel will be sold to airlines at a rate proportional to the fluctuating market price. Demand for refueling services will remain relatively stable, but profit margin will fluctuate.
fuel.desc10: Fuel will be sold to airlines at a specified price, regardless of the current market rate. Demand for refueling services will fluctuate accordingly, but profit margin will remain stable.

tt_opstatus.title: Operational Status
tt_opstatus.desc5: A Fuel Depot that meets requirements
tt_opstatus.desc6: Demand for refueling services will vary by airline, aircraft type, and price sensitivity.

tt_recurring.title: Requires initial infrastructure
tt_recurring.desc1: Recurring orders can only be placed after having built fuel storage tanks.

tt_hud.title: The Fuel Exchange
tt_hud.desc1: Fuel market prices at a glance. You can optionally disable this top HUD panel from the Fuel area of the Ops Control Panel.

maintenance.title: Обслуживание
maintenance.info: Maintenance is allowed during the daily {0} specified above. Objects at or below their maintenance thresholds will be repaired. While undergoing repair, objects are temporarily out of service for use. Regular maintenance is most cost effective, but hinders airport operations!

tt_na.desc1: There are no {0} that can be updated.

build.title: Строительство
build.description: Foundations, taxiways, roads, fences, walls, flooring, and more. This is the lifeblood of your airport.

zones.title: Зоны
zones.description: Specify which areas are for ticketing, security, offices, retail, and more.

staff.title: Персонал
staff.description: The staff are at the center of it all. They will handle the day-to-day operations of your airport.

finance.title: Финансы
finance.subheading: Track Your Cash & Get Bank Loans
finance.description: Your one-stop-shop for everything finance related! Review your financial situation, see revenue & expenses information, or to take out a Bank Loan.

research.title: Исследования
research.description: Allows you to have your administrators to research new objects and tools, improvements to existing tools, and many other beneficial techs.

operations.title: Управление аэропортом
operations.description: Adjust ground transport options, configure your runways, and manage your airport's fuel services.

flight_schedule.title: Управление рейсами
flight_schedule.description: Flight Contracts are the lifeblood of your airport; it all starts with an accepted contract & it ends with a fine-tuned schedule!

flight_status.title: Статус рейсов
flight_status.description: See if the flights coming & going are on-time, their boarding rates, and additional detailed flight status data.

overlay_SecureAreas.title: Стерильные зоны
overlay_SecureAreas.description: Visualize your airport's indoor secure areas, and see how your 'Secure Wings' are divided if you have more than one.

overlay_Environment.title: Состояние окружения
overlay_Environment.description: Visualize the effect that foliage, decorations, and insanitary objects have on passengers.

overlay_Information.title: Доступность информации
overlay_Information.description: Visualize the effect that knowledge-emitting objects have on passengers.

overlay_Sectors.title: Показать секторы
overlay_Sectors.description: Visualize the 'sectors' of your airport. This report/tool will have additional functionality in the future! =)

overlay_paxAI.title: Pax AI Decisions
overlay_paxAI.description: See what the Pax AI considered doing by enabling this report & then clicking on any passenger! Note: this is a debug tool that we're enabling publicly for now, to see if it can help us (and you) to better hone in on AI/selection bugs, and balance tweaks. Please excuse any rough edges!

bank.title: Банковский баланс
bank.desc4: Estimated based on all flights being full and zero cancellations, zero delays, zero missed flights.

airlines.title: Airline Interest
airlines.desc1: Airline interest is based on price sensitivity, passenger satisfaction, airport facilities, and more. Work hard for access to the best airlines, or face having offers reneged!

weather.title: The SimWeather Channel
weather.warning: All runways are currently inactive due to weather. Consider upgrading your runways to increase maximum allowed crosswind tolerances if you already have both vertical and horizontal runways available.

tt1.title: Confirm Land Purchase
tt1.desc: Are you sure you want to purchase this parcel of land?

tt2.title: IMPORTANT - Save Your Game!
tt2.desc: During land expansion, the game may crash when writing "land_expansion.airport" and reloading. We strongly recommend saving your game before continuing.

vending.tt: Applies the current price settings to all of the {0} objects in your airport.

tooltip.ConstructionWarning: One or more workers were recently unable to reach this position.
tooltip.ZoomForDetails: Zoom in for today's flight details.
tooltip.UnassignedToDepot: Not assigned to baggage depot! ({0} candidates)
tooltip.AssignedToCandidateWarning: Warning: One or more assigned {0} are not in the same zone and will not be used.
tooltip.ZoneCapacity: Zone capacity can be increased by enlarging the area of the zone, or using certain 'storage' objects for increasing allowed density.
tooltip.LateDepartureFCWarning: Notice: Waiting for flight crew to board. Check 'Highlight Passengers' to see why.

functionality.ReqZoneRestock: Must be placed within a zone in order to be restocked.
functionality.ReqAssignedGAD: Requires at least one Gate Agent Desk to be assigned.
functionality.ReqTaxiwayPath: Requires a taxiway path to at least one runway.
functionality.ReqTaxiwayPathArrival: Requires a taxiway path to at least one runway set to accept arrivals.
functionality.ReqTaxiwayPathDeparture: Requires a taxiway path to at least one runway set to accept departures.
functionality.ReqTerminalDoor: Requires a door to the terminal.
functionality.ReqAssignedQueueType: One or more assigned {0} must have a designated queue for {1}.
functionality.ReqSecurityQueueType: {0} don't have a designated queue on any security check stand that leads to this gate.
functionality.ReqSecUsage: Usage positions must be in {0} or non-secure area.
functionality.ReqAssignedGate: Requires an Aircraft Gate to be assigned.
functionality.ReqSecuredBy: Requires being secured by one or more security zones.
functionality.ReqRemoteBagScanner: Requires at least 1 Remote Bag Scanner within the same zone to be assigned.
functionality.ReqRemoteStation: Requires Remote Security Station in same zone to be assigned
functionality.ReqFuelNetwork: Not connected to underground fuel pipeline network
functionality.ReqFuelNetworkFuel: Connected to fuel pipeline, but no networked fuel tanks
functionality.ReqFuelNetworkDepot: Connected to fuel pipeline, but no networked Fuel Depot
functionality.ReqAdjacentRoad: Requires an adjacent Road or Taxiway.
functionality.ReqProximityRoad: Must be adjacent to a Road that can reach spawn & despawn points.
functionality.ReqProximityTaxiway: Requires at least one taxiway connected on both ends.
functionality.FuelTankProximityNoSegment: Tank is too far away from road/taxiway to be directly accessible by vehicles.
functionality.FuelTankProximityWithSegment: Tank is too far away from road/taxiway and can only be accessed by vehicles indirectly through other objects on the same underground fuel pipeline.
functionality.ReqLongerRunway: Runway length too short for any aircraft.
functionality.ReqFunctionalHangar: Requires at least one functional Hangar with a Baggage Car.
functionality.ReqToolboxes: Workers can't repair this object right now because no toolboxes are available.
functionality.ReqAccessible: Must be accessible, directly or via door
functionality.ProximityWall: Blocked by nearby Fence or Wall
functionality.RunwayBusy: Runway is already under construction or in use
functionality.DoorPlacement: Must be placed on existing wall or indoors
functionality.ReqWall: Must be on an existing wall
functionality.SecDividerPlacement: Cannot be placed inside or adjacent to a Security Zone
functionality.RwyUpgradeAlignment: Must be properly aligned with the runway
functionality.RwyUpgradeProximity: Must be closer to the runway
functionality.FaceRoad: Must be placed facing a Taxiway or Road
functionality.LRT: Must be placed to the left of light rail tracks (off map)
functionality.QueueAdd: Must add to the end of 1 queue at a time
functionality.QueueRemove: Must remove from the end of 1 queue at a time
functionality.AssignmentNA: Flight crews don't need a queue here
functionality.Conveyor_h2h: {0} must form a direct connection to exactly 1 other hub
functionality.Conveyor_mat_wrong: The conveyor type is wrong and cannot be connected that way
functionality.ZoneFull: One or more {0} Zones are full
functionality.UnscheduledFlightValidation: One or more accepted flights NOT scheduled yet! Click to schedule them now.
functionality.WorkmenCountValidation: Hire one or more Workman to complete your pending construction projects!
functionality.ReqFoundationBelow: Requires foundation on the floor below
functionality.ReqDemolishAbove: Upper floor must be demolished first
functionality.ReqFloorList: Can't draw on this floor. Requires: {0}

strings.ZoneEnclosedValidation: Requires a fully enclosed space with a door.
strings.ZoneSecureValidation: Must be placed in a non-secure area.

NotableProperties.RequiresNetwork: Requires connection to the utility network
NotableProperties.RequiresSecure: Must be placed in a secure area
NotableProperties.RequiresZone: Must be placed in a {0} Zone
NotableProperties.PlacementProximity: Must be placed within {0} meters of a runway
NotableProperties.PlacementFlush: Must be placed on a runway
NotableProperties.LRT: Must be placed on the left side of light rail tracks

None.name: Убрать зону
None.description: Use this to de-zone an area completely.

Ticketing.name: Зона регистрации
Ticketing.description:
The ticketing zone is where passengers will go to print out their boarding passes & check any large luggage that they may have.
One checked bag for free?! Not here.

Security.name: Комната охраны
Security.description: Security zones allow you to scrutinize your passengers and keep your airport safe and secure which your passengers will appreciate. And occasionally you can even give them a little extra "pat down".

Garbage.name: Помойка
Garbage.description:
Janitors will take all of your airport's garbage here. The garbage truck will also come here to pick up & haul it off.
A larger zone accomodates more garbage, and zone efficiency can be further increased by placing Dumpsters in the zone.

Deliveries.name: Разгрузка
Deliveries.description:
This is where your supplies will be delivered to.
Includes all construction supplies, retail inventory, and any other deliveries. Larger zones can store more supplies, and you can use Supply Shelves to further increase the zone efficiency.

Dropoffs.name: Высадка пассажиров
Dropoffs.description: This is where all departing passengers will be dropped off at.

Pickups.name: Посадка пассажиров
Pickups.description: This is where arriving passengers will go to get picked up so that they can leave your airport (and get on with their vacation!).
Pickups.subheading: Passengers waiting to be picked up.

BaggageClaim.name: Зона выдачи багажа
BaggageClaim.description: An area for passengers to pick up their checked baggage.

Cafe.name: Кафе
Cafe.description: This zone allows you to setup a retail space such as a Shopping Area or a Food Service area. Passengers are happier when they're spending their money, and so are you!

Office.name: Офис
Office.description: This zone allows your Administrators & Executives to have their own offices. The execs require offices to be able to do their work and conduct research.

Kitchen.name: Кухня
Kitchen.description: All food served in your restaurants, cafes, and bars will need to be prepared & cooked in a kitchen.

Storage.name: Склад
Storage.description: This is where leftover supply boxes will be stored.

Male_Restroom.name: Мужская уборная
Male_Restroom.description: Passengers won't be very happy if they don't have easy access to restrooms. You'll use this zone to define the restrooms for your passengers to use.

Female_Restroom.name: Женская уборная
Female_Restroom.description: Passengers won't be very happy if they don't have easy access to restrooms. You'll use this zone to define the restrooms for your passengers to use.

Electrical.name: Электрощитовая
Electrical.description: This is where you'll run many of your airports wires to, including much of your low-voltage and audio wiring.

First_Class_Lounge.name: Зал первого класса
First_Class_Lounge.description: Add a lounge for first class passengers to better accommodate their needs and desires.

Flight_Crew_Lounge.name: Зал для экипажей
Flight_Crew_Lounge.description: Add a lounge for flight crews where they can privately relax and wait to catch their flights.

Maintenance.name: Служебное помещение
Maintenance.description: This is where maintenance supplies will be stored.

reason.PropertyTaxImprovements: Property Taxes - Land Improvements ({0} improved tiles)
reason.PropertyTaxLand: Property Taxes - Land Value ({0} total tiles)

TaxiwayDirection.name: Односторонняя рулежная дорожка
TaxiwayDirection.description: Click on existing taxiways to change its one-way direction setting. Continue clicking to rotate through directions or to remove one-way entirely.

AddQueue.name: Увеличить очередь
AddQueue.description: Click & drag to create or extend a defined queue that can be assigned to objects to help improve their throughput.

RemoveQueue.name: Уменьшить очередь
RemoveQueue.description: Click & drag to shorten the end of a queue.

VisualizeQueue.name: Показать очереди
VisualizeQueue.description: A visualization tool which shows all queues and assignments in your airport -- all at once.

AreaSell.name: Продать объекты
AreaSell.description: Draw over the top of Supply Piles in order to sell multiple at once.

AsphaltRunway.name: Асфальтированная ВПП
AsphaltRunway.description: Click & drag to create (or extend an existing) runways. Note extending or intersecting an existing runway requires repainting the entire runway.

ConcreteRunway.name: Бетонная ВПП
ConcreteRunway.description: Click & drag to create (or extend an existing) runways. Note extending or intersecting an existing runway requires repainting the entire runway.

Clear.name: Очистить
Clear.description: Dismantles objects, removes interior walls, and removes flooring.

ClearUtilities.name: Очистить инфраструктуру
ClearUtilities.description: Removes baggage conveyors, fuel pipes, and dismantles utility-related objects.

Demolish.name: Снести
Demolish.description: Removes walls and indoor flooring down to grass.

Fence.description: A chain link wall that can be used to secure areas of your airport.

Foundation.name: Фундамент со стенами
Foundation.description: Makes an area indoors by paving concrete and surrounding it with walls.

FuelPipe.description: Connect fuel systems together using underground fuel pipes.

Ramp.description: For aesthetic purposes only -- you can use this to surround outdoor gates, hangars, etc. for a more realistic look.

Road.name: Дорога
Road.description: Route vehicles to where they need to go with 2x2 sections. Use 'R' key to rotate.

Taxiway.name: Рулежная дорожка
Taxiway.description: Route aircraft from runways to tarmac areas with large 10x10 sections.

Wall.description: A long lasting concrete wall that's perfect for securing and separating indoor areas of your airport.

Window.description: Keep it fresh & airy for your passengers or give them a view, all while still serving similar purposes as a wall does in dividing up spaces.

MovingWalkway.name: Траволатор
MovingWalkway.description: Creates and extends moving walkways which allow passengers to get move around your airport faster and with less effort. Moves in a single direction which can be reversed any time after construction completes.

DemolishUtility.name: Снос инфраструктуры
DemolishUtility.description: Removes underground baggage conveyors & fuel pipelines.

ShowWires.name: Показать провода
ShowWires.description: Show all wired connections for the electronics within your airport. Wires connect much of the low voltage technology together within your airport.

Conveyor.name: Сеть конвееров
Conveyor.d0: Connects underground conveyor network for: Ticketing Desks, Hubs, Endpoints, Depots, Carousels
Conveyor.d3: Connect all objects to a hub
Conveyor.d8: Having trouble? Hover over a Depot or Gate for helpful info. In underground view click any underground object & connected objects will change color.

Finance.name: Финансы
Finance.description: The CFO allows you to conduct additional research and unlock various finance-related utilities such as advanced reports, bank loans, lower taxes, and improved profit margins.

Operations.name: Эксплуатация
Operations.row0: Ability to hire a COO (Chief Operations Officer).

MultiLaneAccess.name: Multi-Lane Access
MultiLaneAccess.row0: Changes your airport entrance and exit to be 2-lane roads for higher throughput.

UpgradedBuses.name: Upgraded Buses
UpgradedBuses.row0: Schedules an extra double-decker bus every 30 minutes.

Pricing.name: Pricing
Pricing.row0: Affords the ability to change prices for runway and terminal usage.

BankInterest.name: Снижение ставки по кредиту I
BankInterest.row0: Drops your interest rate down to 6% on bank loans.

StandbyGates.name: Резервные стоянки
StandbyGates.description: Standby gates can be used to improve airport operations by reducing the number of canceled or delayed flights.

Lightrail.name: Аэроэкспресс
Lightrail.row0: Allows placing a LRT Platform on the map.
Lightrail.description: Light rail reduces traffic congestion by offering passengers a convenient way to arrive and depart from your airport.

LandExpansion.name: Покупка земли
LandExpansion.row0: Allows the purchase of additional map parcels.

Operations2.name: Эксплуатация II
Operations2.row0: Allows management of bus, garbage, retail, and light rail services via the Operations Control Panel.

AviationOps.name: Aviation Ops
AviationOps.row0: Allows you to configure runways to accept only Departures or Arrivals.

LongerTrains.name: Увеличенные поезда
LongerTrains.row0: Заменяет аэроэкспрессы на 4-вагонные составы вместиостью 250 пассажиров!

FuelPorts.name: Fuel Ports
FuelPorts.row0: Allows gates to be upgraded with Fuel Ports that can deliver jet fuel right where it's needed!

AdvTicketing.name: Advanced Ticketing
AdvTicketing.row0: Ability to assign Aircraft Gates to specific Ticketing Desks.

AdvSecurity.name: Усиление безопасности
AdvSecurity.row0: Access to Remote Security Stations & Remote Baggage Scanners for more efficient Security Operations.
AdvSecurity.description: Ability to assign ID Check Stands to Baggage Scanners; and Baggage Scanners to Metal Detectors / Body Scanners -- for precise flow control.

BankInterest2.name: Снижение ставки по кредиту II
BankInterest2.row0: Drops your interest rate down to 3% on bank loans.

FinanceVP.name: VP of Finance
FinanceVP.row0: Allows you to hire a VP of Finance, who also happens to be a CPA.

LowerPropertyTaxes1.name: Сниженние налога на имущество I
LowerPropertyTaxes1.row0: Drops your daily property taxes by 10% of the normal amount.

LowerPropertyTaxes2.name: Сниженние налога на имущество II
LowerPropertyTaxes2.row0: Drops your daily property taxes by 25% of the normal amount.

LowerIncomeTaxes1.name: Сниженние налога на доходы I
LowerIncomeTaxes1.row0: Снижает ежедневный налог на дохды до значения 30%.

LowerIncomeTaxes2.name: Сниженние налога на доходы II
LowerIncomeTaxes2.row0: Снижает ежедневный налог на дохды до значения 25%.

Maintenance.name: Maintenance
Maintenance.row0: Allows you to configure all maintenance options, including repair thresholds for different object types.
